name: STEREOPHYTA (eastoned)
description:
Stereophyta is a game about building a harmonious relationship between the player and the environment through musical creation, appreciation, and care-taking. While there is progression in the game, there is no goal outside of the music itself.

Made by:

 Kas (kghobadi/@theStaticMan)

Julian (solimporta/@solimporta)

Simon (kingslime/@metal_kingslime)

Easton (eastoned/@eastoned)

REVIEWS:

"Literally gasped." -Michael Perez

"I love this, and especially love Trumpet Man™️, I’m writing him in for president." -Emily Fong

"Dude it was really... like... pretty." -Audrey Vidamo

"It looks great!" -Steakfries
